name: [GD] UAC Bypass via ICMLuaUtil Elevated COM Interface
description: Identifies User Account Control (UAC) bypass attempts via the ICMLuaUtil Elevated COM interface. Attackers may attempt to bypass UAC to stealthily execute code with elevated permissions.
author: Elastic
query:
process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and
 process.parent.name == "dllhost.exe" and
 process.parent.args in ("/Processid:{3E5FC7F9-9A51-4367-9063-A120244FBEC7}", "/Processid:{D2E7041B-2927-42FB-8E9F-7CE93B6DC937}") and
 process.pe.original_file_name != "WerFault.exe"
